# InuYasha, a Feudal Fairy Tale

#REDIRECT Inuyasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale

---

## InuYasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale

#REDIRECT Inuyasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale

---

## Inuyasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale

| genre = Fighting
| modes = Single player, multiplayer
| director = Kenichiro HoriShinichi Yoshimoto
| producer = Hideyuki TomiokaHiroshi Matsumoto
| designer = Keiichiro Morita
| programmer = Kenshi Abe
| artist = Shigemi Ikeda
| writer =
| composer = KenshiroHiroyuki Takei
}}
is a 2D fighting game based on the manga and anime series Inuyasha. It consists of battles and minigames in an effort to retrieve shards of the sacred Jewel of Four Souls, essentially following the overall plot of the series.
Characters
* Inuyasha
* Kagome Higurashi
* Kagura
* Kikyo
* Koga
* Miroku
* Naraku
* Sango
* Sesshomaru
* Shippo
* Totosai
}}
Reception
| EGM = 6/10
| OPM =
}}
The game received "mixed or average" reviews according to video game review aggregator Metacritic.
